#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
int i,j,t,k;
int a[1000001],b[1000001];
//prime no. generation
for(i=2;i<1000000;i++)
  a[i]=i;

for(i=2;i<500000;i++)
  if(a[i])
     for(j=2*i;j<1000000;j+=i)
          a[j]=0;  


for(i=0;i<1000000;i++)
   if(a[i])
      b[k++]=a[i];

//end of generation

int n,count;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
 cin>>n;
 count=0;
 for(i=2;i<k-1;i++)
  {if(2*b[i]==b[i-1]+b[i+1])
     count++;
   if(count==n)
       {cout<<b[i]<<endl;break;}
  }
}
return 0;
}
